title: Notes Edit & Update
description: Learn state mutation and update patterns for note applications including editing, updating, and modifying existing notes

functions.name: updateNote
functions.description: Update properties of an existing note while preserving immutability

returns.description: New note object with updated properties

functions.name: updateNoteInList
functions.description: Update a specific note in a list of notes by ID

parameters.name: noteId
parameters.description: ID of the note to update

returns.description: New array with the updated note

functions.name: updateNoteTitle
functions.description: Update only the title of a note

returns.description: New note object with updated title

functions.name: updateNoteContent
functions.description: Update only the content of a note

returns.description: New note object with updated content and modified timestamp

functions.name: addTagToNote
functions.description: Add a single tag to a note's tags array

returns.description: New note object with the tag added (no duplicates)

functions.name: removeTagFromNote
functions.description: Remove a tag from a note's tags array

returns.description: New note object without the specified tag

functions.name: replaceTagInNote
functions.description: Replace one tag with another tag in a note

returns.description: New note object with tag replaced

functions.name: updateNotesInList
functions.description: Update multiple notes in a list based on a condition

parameters.name: condition
parameters.description: Function that returns true for notes to update

functions.name: validateNoteUpdate
functions.description: Validate that updates are valid before applying them

returns.description: Object with isValid (boolean) and errors (array of error messages)

functions.name: mergeNotes
functions.description: Combine content from multiple notes into one

parameters.name: notes
parameters.description: Array of note objects to merge

returns.description: New note with combined content and merged tags
